SetActive.name: SetActive
SetActive.description: Makes the current sheet the active sheet.

GetActiveCell.name: GetActiveCell
GetActiveCell.description: Returns an object that represents the active cell

GetSelection.name: GetSelection
GetSelection.description: Returns an object that represents the selection range

GetCells.name: GetCells
GetCells.description: Returns a ApiRange that represents all the cells on the worksheet (not just the cells that are currently in use).

GetRows.name: GetRows
GetRows.description: Returns a ApiRange that represents all the cells on the rows range.

GetCols.name: GetCols
GetCols.description: Returns a ApiRange that represents all the cells on the columns range.

GetUsedRange.name: GetUsedRange
GetUsedRange.description: Returns a ApiRange that represents the used range on the specified worksheet.

SetName.name: SetName
SetName.description: Set a name to the current active sheet.

params.name: sName
params.description: The name which will be displayed for the current sheet at the sheet tab.

GetRange.name: GetRange
GetRange.description: Returns an object that represents the selected range of the current sheet. Can be a single cell - A1, or cells from a single row - A1:E1, or cells from a single column - A1:A10, or cells from several rows and columns - A1:E10.

params.name: sRange
params.description: The range of cells from the current sheet.

GetRangeByNumber.name: GetRangeByNumber
GetRangeByNumber.description: Returns an object that represents the selected range of the current sheet using the row/column coordinates for the cell selection.

params.name: nRow
params.description: The number of the row to set the cell coordinates.

params.name: nCol
params.description: The number of the column to set the cell coordinates.

FormatAsTable.name: FormatAsTable
FormatAsTable.description: Format the selected range of cells from the current sheet as a table (with the first row formatted as a header). As the first row is always formatted as a table header, you need to select at least two rows for the table to be formed correctly.

params.name: sRange
params.description: The range of cells from the current sheet which will be formatted as a table.

SetColumnWidth.name: SetColumnWidth
SetColumnWidth.description: Sets the width of the specified columns. One unit of column width is equal to the width of one character in the Normal style. For proportional fonts, the width of the character 0 (zero) is used.

params.name: nColumn
params.description: The number of the column to set the width to.

params.name: nWidth
params.description: The width of the column divided by 7 pixels.

SetRowHeight.name: SetRowHeight
SetRowHeight.description: Sets the height of the specified row measured in points. A point is 1/72 inch

SetDisplayGridlines.name: SetDisplayGridlines
SetDisplayGridlines.description: Specifies whether the current sheet gridlines must be displayed or not.

params.name: isDisplayed
params.description: Specifies whether the current sheet gridlines must be displayed or not. The default value is true.

SetDisplayHeadings.name: SetDisplayHeadings
SetDisplayHeadings.description: Specifies whether the current sheet row/column headers must be displayed or not.

params.name: isDisplayed
params.description: Specifies whether the current sheet row/column headers must be displayed or not. The default value is true.

params.name: nPoints
params.description: in points.

params.name: nPoints
params.description: in points.

params.name: nPoints
params.description: in points.

params.name: nPoints
params.description: in points.

params.name: bPrint
params.description: Determines whether row and column headings will be printed with this page.

params.name: bPrint
params.description: Determines whether grid lines of cells are printed on the page.

AddDefName.name: AddDefName
AddDefName.description: Defines a new name for a range of cells.

params.name: sRef
params.description: Must contain the sheet name, followed sign ! , followed by a range of cells. Example: "Sheet1!$A$1:$B$2".

AddChart.name: AddChart
AddChart.description: Create a chart of the set type from the selected data range of the current sheet. Please note, that the horizontal nColOffset and vertical nRowOffset offsets are calculated within the limits of the specified nFromCol column and nFromRow row cell only. If this value exceeds the cell width or height, another vertical/horizontal position will be set.

params.name: sDataRange
params.description: The selected cell range which will be used to get the data for the chart, formed specifically and including the sheet name.

params.name: bInRows
params.description: Specifies whether to take the data from the rows or from the columns. If true the data from the rows will be used.

params.name: sType
params.description: The chart type used for the chart display.

params.name: nStyleIndex
params.description: The chart color style index (can be 1 - 48, as described in OOXML specification).

params.name: nExtX
params.description: The chart width in English measure units

params.name: nExtY
params.description: The chart height in English measure units.

params.name: nFromCol
params.description: The number of the column where the beginning of the chart will be placed.

params.name: nColOffset
params.description: The offset from the nFromCol column to the left part of the chart measured in English measure units.

params.name: nFromRow
params.description: The number of the row where the beginning of the chart will be placed.

params.name: nRowOffset
params.description: The offset from the nFromRow row to the upper part of the chart measured in English measure units.

AddShape.name: AddShape
AddShape.description: Adds the shape to the current sheet with the parameters specified. Please note, that the horizontal nColOffset and vertical nRowOffset offsets are calculated within the limits of the specified nFromCol column and nFromRow row cell only. If this value exceeds the cell width or height, another vertical/horizontal position will be set.

params.name: sType
params.description: The shape type which specifies the preset shape geometry.

params.name: nWidth
params.description: The shape width in English measure units.

params.name: nHeight
params.description: The shape height in English measure units.

params.name: oFill
params.description: The color or pattern used to fill the shape.

params.name: oStroke
params.description: The stroke used to create the element shadow.

params.name: nFromCol
params.description: The number of the column where the beginning of the image will be placed.

params.name: nColOffset
params.description: The offset from the nFromCol column to the left part of the shape measured in English measure units.

params.name: nFromRow
params.description: The number of the row where the beginning of the image will be placed.

params.name: nRowOffset
params.description: The offset from the nFromRow row to the upper part of the shape measured in English measure units.

AddImage.name: AddImage
AddImage.description: Adds the image to the current sheet with the parameters specified.

params.name: sImageSrc
params.description: The image source where the image to be inserted should be taken from (currently only internet URL or Base64 encoded images are supported).

params.name: nWidth
params.description: The image width in English measure units.

params.name: nHeight
params.description: The image height in English measure units.

params.name: nFromCol
params.description: The number of the column where the beginning of the image will be placed.

params.name: nColOffset
params.description: The offset from the nFromCol column to the left part of the image measured in English measure units.

params.name: nFromRow
params.description: The number of the row where the beginning of the image will be placed.

params.name: nRowOffset
params.description: The offset from the nFromRow row to the upper part of the image measured in English measure units.

params.name: sImageSrc
params.description: The image source where the image to be inserted should be taken from (currently only internet URL or Base64 encoded images are supported).

params.name: nWidth
params.description: The image width in English measure units.

params.name: nHeight
params.description: The image height in English measure units.
